name: your house is on fire.
description:
CW:// Distress

Made for the Boundless Jam 2021.

A point-and-click adventure. Your neighbour wakes you up in the middle of the night, telling you that your house is fire. Navigate the obstacles to escape.

How to Play:

Everything is played using a mouse click.

Click on the dialogue arrow to proceed dialogue.

Objects that are highlighted can be picked up. Click a highlighted object to add it to your inventory.

Click on the objects in the environment to interact with them. This depends on what you have currently equipped.

If you have nothing equipped, you will examine the object.

If you have an item equipped, you will try to use it.

To changed your equipped item, click on the button in the top left to cycle through your inventory.

If you get stuck, read all the dialogue first before clicking on the hint button.

Tips:

Try click on the environment with different objects.

Make sure to read all of the dialogue.

You can use a hint if you have got stuck.
